headline: University Awards: contact details
text: Let us know if you have any questions, however please refer to the frequently asked questions before contacting us. For general enquiries, please contact: Danielle Senior, events manager on020 3353 2418or email danielle.senior@theguardian.comPamela Mathews, events assistant on020 3353 4957or email pamela.mathews@theguardian.com For information on sponsorship opportunities, please email sunita.gordon@theguardian.com For all press requests please email Christine.crowther@theguardian.com
